takeActionBlock.text: Do you want to show others that you value individual freedom, and want to express your concerns about the current state of freedom in our society? Express yourself! You are free to generate your own Covid star based on any input you'd wish. I'd like to encourage you to do so as well, in order to emphasise your individual freedom. If you just prefer to order a set, than that is also just a possibility. There are currently a limited set of items available with pre-determined strings. But if you prefer to have your own design, than you can download it as a PNG or SVG on the download page. Do not forget to use the hashtag #covidstar when you post them online, to inspire others to also express their concerns about the decline of individual freedom and the normalisation of censorship.
takeActionBlock.notice: None of the information on this website is being stored or transmitted to external parties. This means that all of the covid stars are generated locally, and that the source input of these stars can not be traced back, since not all stars are truly unique.

footerBlock.text: This website, the illustrations and the associated algorithm are imagined, designed and developed by Jeffrey Arts as a response to the Corona pasport, and forms a part in his artistic practice in which he explores and extends his identity via a diverse set of actions, creations & questions. Often with the use of self developed soft- & hardware.
footerBlock.title: Footnote

aboutBlock.text:
We live in a society in which the individual freedom is under pressure. There seems to be a singular 'allowed' way of thinking about all kinds of subject which have influence on us all. They why disagree with the main narrative, are being put in some sort of negatively loaded box. All in the name of ‘freedom for everyone’. A freedom in which the freedom of the other, seems to be more valued than the freedom of the individualistic invidual. But how can you give the other true freedom, when you constrain their freedom via the same manner. There is no good or evil, there is only perception of deeds, thoughts and things. Which we determine to be good or bad. Without religious ideologies, these concepts of right or wrong are based upon our economy. That it is a good way to constrain our individual freedom, in order to keep the economy in good health is belief.

That belief leads to conflict is something that our history have shown us plenty of times. Because of this, it is uppermost important that everyone has the freedom to believe what he or she believes. In a society there must be space and respect for every other person who looks different to the world as you do. The Covid star is a symbol of exactly this. Respecting people who think differently, and give people the freedom to express their believe in a way that they want. We need to stop treating the comparisons between groups of people as absolute truths, but solely as a guide. Because the group to which the individual has been classified by others, does not have to be the group to which the individual identifies themselves.

The Covid star is designed for them who would like to speak up about this subject without using any words. The Covid star is being generated based on any text input, this way it underlines our individual differences, while the person who expresses him or herself with this symbol connects themselves to group. A group of people who fight for more individual freedom, and against the systematic ideological suppression of those who think differently
aboutBlock.title: The Covid star

downloadPage.title: Take action !
downloadPage.headerText: On this page you can download your own Covid star so you can spread the message behind via different ways. The easiest way to spread the message is via social media, use the hashtag #covidster in your message associated with the image of your Covid star. To express yourself against the suppression of individual freedom. As a next step you can spread the message in the analog world via stickers, patches or flags. Your Covid star can be downloaded as PNG or SVG. You can also find some links on the bottom of this page, to help you materialize your star. If you prefer to let someone else make it, there are limited possibilities to order custom designs. If you are able to produce custom designs on demand feel free to reach out to me, so we might be able to expand the possibilities.

downloadSection.title: Download your own Covid star
downloadSection.description: In order to bring the idea behind the Covid star further you can help by downloading your star as SVG or PNG. You are free to use it however you like, but don't forget to use it with respect to anyone who thinks different about it. You can share it directly via social media, but you can also use it to make posters, flags, stickers or patches to name a few. This way the message can be spread anonymously and on its own. Do not forget to use the hashtag #covidstar when you share it on social media. This way we don't just influence the algorithms, but increase the reach of the message at the same time.

diySection.title: Materialisation
diySection.description: Below a collection of curated links which should help you materialize your Covid star.

connectSection.title: Connect
connectSection.description:
In a society in which the indivudual freedom us under pressure, it is extra important to keep engaging in conversations with each other. Talk about this subject with friend, family, and strangers as well. Explain them what the Covid star stands for, without convincing them about your own righteousness. Solely show them what it means to you, and why you value what it stands for, for you. The entire concept of good or bad is subjective to the ideology it is based on. Whenever your ideology differs from that of the other, it is simply impossible to convince the other from you right- or wrongness. Espescially when different truths become contradictional to each other.

Personally I would love to hear what you think of the Covid star, and/or what it stands for. You can reach me via Insta, or via mail.
